mapper.select: select *, dk.id as departmentKindId, constant_variable.id as constantId, constant_variable.name as constantName, dk.is_delete as kindisDelete, constant_variable.is_delete as constantVariable from department join department_kind dk on department.kind_id = dk.id join constant_variable on dk.classification_id = constant_variable.id where department.is_delete = 0 and dk.is_delete = 0 and constant_variable.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY kind_id ASC

select *, dk.id as departmentKindId, constant_variable.id as constantId, constant_variable.name as constantName, dk.is_delete as kindisDelete, constant_variable.is_delete as constantVariable from department join department_kind dk on department.kind_id = dk.id join constant_variable on dk.classification_id = constant_variable.id where classification_id = #{classificationId}

select *, dk.id as departmentKindId, constant_variable.id as constantId, constant_variable.name as constantName, dk.is_delete as kindisDelete, constant_variable.is_delete as typeIsDelete from department join department_kind dk on department.kind_id = dk.id join constant_variable on dk.classification_id = constant_variable.id where department.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY kind_id ASC
select * from department where kind_id in (select dk.id from department_kind dk where classification_id = #{classification}) and is_delete = false;
